metadata.title: Thursday, 30th July, 2015
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

(b)    whether the contentious and non-contentious Clauses/issues have already been identified and, if so, by whom; and
(c)    when the Constitution of Zambia (Amendment) Bill will be introduced in the House to address the issues at (a) above.

(b)    if there is a policy shift by the Government, what the cause of the shift is;

(d)    when the floor price will be announced.

parts: (a)    when the construction of Kabulamema Secondary School in Kabompo District will commence, considering that the local community has already constructed the foundation; and

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication when a pontoon will be procured for Meso Akawa Crossing Point on the Lungwevungu River in Mitete District.
parts: (a)    why disbursement of budgeted funds to Government institutions in Kalabo District is erratic; and

(b)    what measures have been taken to improve the funding in 2015 and beyond. W105    Mr P Phiri (Mkaika) - to ask the Minister of Finance what measures the Government is taking to ensure that the country does not default in repaying the US$750 million and US$1 billion Eurobonds by 2022 and 2024, respectively. W106    Mr Lufuma (Kabompo West) - to ask the Minister of Home Affairs:
(a)    when a utility motor vehicle will be provided to Kabompo Police Station;
(b)    whether the Government has any plans to repair and return to Kabompo Police, a truck that was involved in an accident; and

(c)    if so, when the actions at (b) will be taken. W107    Mr Lufuma (Kabompo West) - to ask the Minister of Community Development, Mother and Child Health when medical staff will be deployed to Mufuli-Wa-Njamba Health Post in Kabompo West Parliamentary Constituency, following the completion of the construction of a staff house. W108    Mr I Banda (Lumezi) - to ask the Vice President:
(a)    when the Disaster Management and Mitigation Unit will construct bridges at the following points in Chasefu Parliamentary Constituency:
(i)    Luwelo River on Emusa-Munyukwa-Chifunda road; and (ii)    Luwasuku River on Egi Chikeni-Mtwalo road; and
(b)    what the cost of the two projects is. W109    Mr Katuka (Mwinilunga) - to ask the Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication:
(a)    when the national airline promised by the Government will be established and launched; and
(b)    how much money will be spent on establishing the airline. W110    Mr Katuka (Mwinilunga) - to ask the Vice President:
(a)    how much money was spent on the Presidential by-election held on 20th January, 2015; and
(b)    what the contribution of the following, to the by-election, was:
(i)    the Government of the Republic of Zambia; and (ii)    co-operating partners.
